titles: To the King's most excellent Maiesty. The humble address of the Society of the Middle-Temple.
author: Bernard, John.
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
Middle Temple (London, England)
publisher: Printed for Jacob Tonson at the Judges Head in Chancery Lane near Fleetstreet,
notes: Letter, signed John Bernard, speaker, rejoicing at the delivery from the Rye House plot.
Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library, Chicago, Illinois.
